languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс улыбается, в уголках его глаз собираются морщинки.{/n} "Мне приятны твои слова. Не переживай, я уже выходил из подобных ситуаций. Просто нужно немного времени".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс улыбается, в уголках его рта собираются морщинки.{/n} "Мне... очень приятны твои слова. Не переживай, я уже выходил из подобных ситуаций. Просто нужно немного времени".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс улыбается, в уголках его глаз собираются морщинки.{/n} "Мне приятны твои слова. Не переживай, я уже выходил из подобных ситуаций. Просто нужно немного времени".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."
{n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."
{n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."
{n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."

languages.text: {n}海因里希微笑着，眼角浮现出了皱纹。{/n}“无论怎样，你这么说我都很高兴。别担心，我以前也遇到过类似的状况，只要给我些时间就够了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希微笑着，眼角浮现出了皱纹。{/n}“无论怎样，你这么说我都很高兴。别担心，我以前也遇到过类似的状况，只要给我些时间就够了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sonríe y se forman arrugas en los rabillos de sus ojos.{/n} «De todos modos, me alegro de oírlo. No se preocupe, he salido de situaciones peores. Solo necesito tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sonríe y se forman arrugas en los rabillos de sus ojos.{/n} «De todos modos, me alegro de oírlo. No se preocupe, he salido de situaciones peores. Solo necesito tiempo».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは微笑み、目尻にしわを寄せる。{/n}「それでも、うれしいよ。心配しないでくれ…こう言う状況は以前にも経験したことがある。少し時間が必要なだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは微笑み、目尻にしわを寄せる。{/n}「それでも、うれしいよ。心配しないでくれ…こう言う状況は以前にも経験したことがある。少し時間が必要なだけだ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sourit et des rides se forment aux coins de ses yeux.{/n} « Ça fait plaisir à entendre. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai connu pire. J'ai juste besoin d'un peu de temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sourit et des rides se forment aux coins de ses yeux.{/n} « Ça fait plaisir à entendre. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai connu pire. J'ai juste besoin d'un peu de temps. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lächelt, wodurch sich an seinen Augen Falten bilden.{/n} "Ich finde es trotzdem schön, das zu hören. Macht Euch keinen Kopf – es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass ich so was erlebe. Ich brauche nur etwas Zeit."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lächelt, wodurch sich an seinen Augen Falten bilden.{/n} "Ich finde es trotzdem schön, das zu hören. Macht Euch keinen Kopf – es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass ich so was erlebe. Ich brauche nur etwas Zeit."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in gülümsemesiyle gözlerinin kenarlarında çizgiler oluşuyor.{/n} "Yine de bunu duymak güzel. Endişelenme. Daha önce de böyle durumların üstesinden geldim. Sadece biraz zamana ihtiyacım var."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles, and creases form at the corners of his eyes.{/n} "All the same, it's nice to hear. Don't worry — I've come through situations like this before. I just need a little time."
